trans-unit.source: Represents a row within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una riga all'interno di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The DetailsViewRow class is used to represent an individual row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: La classe DetailsViewRow viene utilizzata per rappresentare una singola riga in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Each row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control has a designated row type.
trans-unit.target: Ogni riga di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controllo dispone di un determinato tipo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the row types that are valid for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente sono elencati i tipi di riga validi per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: |Row type|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|A data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The empty data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: | Tipo di riga | Descrizione | |--------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| Una riga di dati nel controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| Riga di dati vuoti di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when there are no records to display.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|A pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| To determine the row type of a DetailsViewRow object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La riga di dati vuoto viene visualizzata in un controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>quando non sono presenti record da visualizzare. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| La riga di piè di pagina nel controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| La riga di intestazione nel controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| Una riga del pager del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>. | Per determinare il tipo di oggetto DetailsViewRow, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A DetailsViewRow object also has a state associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto DetailsViewRow associato anche uno stato.

trans-unit.source: The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato può essere una combinazione bit per bit dei valori nella tabella seguente.

trans-unit.source: |State value|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|The DetailsViewRow object is an alternate row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|The DetailsViewRow object is in edit mode.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|The DetailsViewRow object is in insert mode.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|The DetailsViewRow object is in its normal (default) state.| To determine the state of a DetailsViewRow object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Valore di stato | Descrizione | |-----------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>| L'oggetto DetailsViewRow è una riga alternativa nel controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>| L'oggetto DetailsViewRow è in modalità di modifica. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>| L'oggetto DetailsViewRow è in modalità di inserimento. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>| L'oggetto DetailsViewRow è nello stato normale (impostazione predefinita). | Per determinare lo stato di un oggetto DetailsViewRow, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control stores all its data rows in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controllo Archivia tutte le righe di dati di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of a DetailsViewRow object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per determinare l'indice di un oggetto DetailsViewRow nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>insieme, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the individual cells of the DetailsViewRow object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile accedere alle singole celle dell'oggetto DetailsViewRow utilizzando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a cell contains controls, you can retrieve a control from the cell by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Se una cella contiene controlli, è possibile recuperare un controllo dalla cella tramite la <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>insieme della cella.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the cell to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>metodo della cella per trovare il controllo, se il controllo ha un <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>proprietà specificata.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a field value from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> field column or an automatically generated field column, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A> property of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Per recuperare un valore di campo da un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>campo colonna o un campo generato automaticamente, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A>proprietà della cella.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a field value from other field column types where the field value is bound to a control, first retrieve the control from the appropriate cell and then access the appropriate property of the control.
trans-unit.target: Per recuperare un valore del campo da altri tipi di colonne in cui il valore del campo è associato a un controllo, recuperare innanzitutto il controllo dalla cella appropriata e quindi accedere alla proprietà appropriata del controllo.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is possible to use a data-binding expression directly in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> field column without binding the value to a property of a control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > È possibile utilizzare un'espressione di associazione di dati direttamente in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>colonna campo senza associare il valore a una proprietà di un controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the field value is automatically placed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl> control.
trans-unit.target: In questo caso, il valore del campo viene automaticamente inserito un <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the field value, you must first retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl> control from the appropriate cell and then use its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per recuperare il valore del campo, è necessario recuperare il <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>controllo dalla cella appropriata e quindi usare il relativo <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the DetailsViewRow class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Per un elenco di valori di proprietà iniziali per un'istanza della classe DetailsViewRow, vedere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>costruttore.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo costruttore per inizializzare una nuova istanza della <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: La tabella seguente illustra i valori di proprietà iniziali per un'istanza di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>|The value specified by the `itemIndex` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A>|The value specified by the `rowType` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A>|The value specified by the `rowState` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Proprietà | Il valore iniziale | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>| Il valore specificato per il `itemIndex` parametro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A>| Il valore specificato per il `rowType` parametro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A>| Il valore specificato per il `rowState` parametro. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: L'indice della riga di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>insieme del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"> </xref> valori di enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> valori di enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to pass an event up the page's ASP.NET server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Determina se passare un evento di gerarchia dei controlli server ASP.NET della pagina.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: L'origine dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'evento è stato annullato; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'indice del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> oggetto di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>insieme del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: Use the RowIndex property to determine the index of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà RowIndex per determinare l'indice di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>oggetto di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>insieme del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data rows.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questa proprietà si applica solo alle righe di dati.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: L'indice del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>insieme del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stato del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Use the RowState property to determine the state of the row.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà RowState per determinare lo stato della riga.

trans-unit.source: The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato può essere una combinazione bit per bit dei valori nella tabella seguente.

trans-unit.source: |State value|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowState.Alternate`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is an alternate row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |`DataControlRowState.Edit`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is in edit mode.| |`DataControlRowState.Insert`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is in insert mode.| |`DataControlRowState.Normal`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is in its normal (default) state.| This property is commonly used to determine the state of a row before performing an operation.
trans-unit.target: | Valore di stato | Descrizione | |-----------------|-----------------| | `DataControlRowState.Alternate`| L'oggetto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>è una riga alternativa nel controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>. | | `DataControlRowState.Edit`| L'oggetto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>è in modalità di modifica. | | `DataControlRowState.Insert`| L'oggetto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>è in modalità di inserimento. | | `DataControlRowState.Normal`| L'oggetto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>è nello stato normale (impostazione predefinita). | Questa proprietà viene comunemente utilizzata per determinare lo stato di una riga prima di eseguire un'operazione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Combinazione bit per bit di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> valori di enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row type of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Use the RowType property to determine the type of row that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object represents.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà RowType per determinare il tipo di riga che di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>oggetto rappresenta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the valid row type values.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente sono elencati i valori di tipo di riga valida.

trans-unit.source: |Row type|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowType.DataRow`|A data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.EmptyDataRow`|The empty data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: | Tipo di riga | Descrizione | |--------------|-----------------| | `DataControlRowType.DataRow`| Una riga di dati nel controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>. | | `DataControlRowType.EmptyDataRow`| Riga di dati vuoti di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when there are no records to display.| |`DataControlRowType.Footer`|The footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.Header`|The header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.Pager`|A pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| This property is commonly used to determine a row's type before performing an operation.
trans-unit.target: La riga di dati vuoto viene visualizzata in un controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>quando non sono presenti record da visualizzare. | | `DataControlRowType.Footer`| La riga di piè di pagina nel controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>. | | `DataControlRowType.Header`| La riga di intestazione nel controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>. | | `DataControlRowType.Pager`| Una riga del pager del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>. | Questa proprietà viene comunemente utilizzata per determinare il tipo di una riga prima di eseguire un'operazione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"> </xref> valori.
